V2 I, N, Ri;

#define ID_MAX_PHOTO  15.

#define ID_LIGHT      17.

#define TX( n, i ) texture( n, i )
#define tx( n, i ) ( \
	n < 2. \
        ? n < 1. \
        	? TX( iChannel0, i ) \
        	: TX( iChannel1, i ) \
		: n < 3. \
            ? TX( iChannel2, i ) \
            : TX( iChannel3, i ) )

V3 rot( V3 r, V3 axe, V1 alpha ) {
    
    axe = normalize( axe );
    
    V3	z = dot( r, axe ) * axe,
        x = r - z,
        y = cross( axe, x );
    
    RN cos( alpha ) * x + sin( alpha ) * y + z;
}

#define R4( n, x, y ) tx( n, Ri * ( .5 + V2( x, y ) ) )
#define R3( n, x, y ) R4( n, x, y ).xyz
#define rd( x, y ) R3( 0., x, y )
#define REP V0 mainImage( out V4 o, V2 i ) { \
	INIT \
	V2 s = V2( lessThan( _.ww, N ) ); \
    V1 n = s.x + 2. * s.y; \
    N = mod( 2. * N, _.yy ); \
    O = tx( n, N ); \
	FIN }
